text: Looks like the Ace of Cakes will be shopping for a wedding cake of his own! Food Network star and popular pastry chef Duff Goldman is officially engaged to writer Johnna Colbry. Goldman is best known for his stunning creations in the kitchen, which have been featured on the network ’ s “ Ace of Cakes ” and “ Food Network Challenge, ” and he ’ s also the owner of Charm City Cakes, a bakery with locations in Los Angeles and Baltimore.
